title: Wes Craven
summary: Wesley Earl Craven (August 2, 1939 – August 30, 2015) was an American film director, screenwriter, producer, actor, and editor, who was known for his pioneering work in the horror genre, particularly slasher films, where he mixed horror cliches with humor and satire.[1][2][3] The cultural impact and influence of his work have dubbed him a “Master of Horror”.[4][5][6][7][8]
